text: David T. Lametti (born August 10, 1962) is a Canadian politician. He was the minister of justice and attorney general of Canada from 2019 to 2023. He is a member of the Liberal Party. He is a member of Parliament (MP) and has represented LaSalle—Émard—Verdun in the House of Commons since 2015. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian lawyers Category:Politicians from Ontario Category:Politicians from Montreal Category:Academics of McGill University
title: David Lametti
